name: Aliens Taste My Sword - Prototype
description:
A brave knight facing aliens to save his beloved. An epic adventure that can change the history of the world.

Mechanical prototype, started in #gbjam3, just as mechanical test.

Palette: D7E895h AEC440h 527F39h 204631h

By: SD - Entertainment and Independent Cake.

* Note 1 .: The game being a prototype does not have sound effects and may contain bugs.

*Note 2 .: Character models and animation motion based game Tiny Dangerous Dungeons (http://gamejolt.com/games/platformer/tiny-dangerous-dungeons/19440/)
